0: Housekeeping did not even clean our room one day
We were a family of 4 2 adults and 2 kids when I reserved a room with 2 beds upon arrival they only had a king available they stated all the 2 beds were gone
Huge disappointment in terms of broken in room coffee system poorly functioning shower
And bath drains need to be cleaned out frequently
In the room the bed was comfortable but the shower tub combo would not drain standing in ankle deep water and the iron was broke not a shock
The hotel is a little dated as seen by the exterior and some interior furnishings
Disappointed no microwave in the room and found broccoli inside the refrigerator that was not cleaned out by housekeeping
Our room was located right next to the side exit and throughout the night our sleep was interrupted due to door opening and closing
He ended up having to open up a panel in the bathroom ceiling to switch it from heat to AC
Check in was easy and the room even came with free water bottles to battle the heat outside
1: The hotel is well kept very modern furnishings and in a great location in Mesa
Room was spacious and beautifully decorated
They moved us to a room on the other side of the hotel and brought a fan which helped
It was very modern and up to date furnishings and furniture
Nice TV with streaming services and good work station in the room
Hotel is nice Room bathroom was in poor repair
Room service was quick and we enjoyed our breakfast
The rooms were clean and the staff was friendly
The view was nice and the tv options were good
